Texts.Chs: 我发现了一种不寻常的科技，它允许你变成一个球，以通过哪些我不能通过的地方。^green;按下[F]^reset;来激活它。
Texts.Eng: I've discovered an unusual technology that allows me to turn into a ball. With it I can access areas I otherwise couldn't. ^green;Press [F]^reset; to activate it.

Texts.Chs: 我发现了一种不寻常的科技，它允许你变成一个球，以通过哪些我不能通过的地方。^green;按下[F]^reset;来激活它。
Texts.Eng: I've discovered an unusual technology that allows me to turn into a ball. With it I can access areas I otherwise couldn't. ^green;Press [F]^reset; to activate.
